move_to.tab: Move to a dedicated userscript tab
move_to.wme-prefs: Move to the editor preferences panel

clone_geometry_toggle.label: Clone roundabout geometry
clone_geometry_toggle.help_label: Select this if you want new junction boxes to have the geometry of the roundabout they are applied to

graphical.label: Graphical
graphical.description: An icon visualizing the selected instruction will be displayed

textual.label: Textual
textual.description: A single letter will be displayed, determining the applied instruction

BIG_JUNCTION_REQUIRED.description: Node is missing a Junction Box connection

auto_clone_roundabout_geom_confirm.title: Roundaboutize Junction Boxes?
auto_clone_roundabout_geom_confirm.details: Do you want to use the geometry of the roundabout for this Junction Box?

restoration_disabled_reasons.SIGNATURE_MISMATCH: Junction box signature is incompatible with the latest Big Junction backup
restoration_disabled_reasons.BIG_JUNCTION_EDITING_DISALLOWED: You're not allowed to edit this Big Junction
restoration_disabled_reasons.TURN_GUIDANCE_EDITING_DISALLOWED: Big Junction has some turn guidance that you can not apply

confirm_overwrite_backup.title: Override backup?
confirm_overwrite_backup.details: You're about to override a Big Junction backup. This action is irreversible

jbu101.title: Junction Box backup hasn't been used
jbu101.solution: Restore the backup to avoid data loss
